subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A 13-year-old Arizona boy, Hayden Walton, died after a baseball hit him over the heart as he tried to bunt in a Little League game in Winslow, officials said.
snippet: A 13-year-old Arizona boy, Hayden Walton, died after a baseball hit him over the heart as he tried to bunt in a Little League game in Winslow, officials said.
